item.title: hypergate
item.description: Hypergate is a zero-configuration, peer-to-peer encrypted tunnel that enables easy communication between Docker containers and/or physical machines located anywhere, even behind NAT.

item.title: jme3-bullet-vhacd
item.description: This is a library that uses java bindings for Khaled Mamou’s V-HACD to decompose concave meshes into hull-shapes in jmonkey engine.

item.title: JCubemapAssembler
item.description: JCubemapAssembler is a java application that can be used to assemble six separate face images into a single cubemap and export it as a dds file.
